item.title: Nautical Twilight
item.description: RStudio IDE and syntax theme https://github.com/lusignan/Nautical-Twilight Compatability RStudio 1.3 Installation To install, run the following in your RStudio console: rstudioapi::addTheme("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lusignan/Nautical-Twilight/main/nautical-twilight.rstheme", apply = TRUE)
